column1: Events that occurred on .
==On Earth==
* 1901 - Robert Havard
* 1942 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to John Kettle.
* 1965 - Actress Robyn Malcolm is born.
* 1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Amy Ronald (15 March 1969).
* 1981 - The second episode of The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2009 - Arda Reconstructed: The Creation of the Published Silmarillion is published.
==In Arda==
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Gandalf meets Thorin at the Prancing Pony
column2: and they devise a plan to rid Lonely Mountain of Smaug.

column1: ** In the early morning the Witch-king breaks the Great Gate of Minas Tirith of Minas Tirith.
** Denethor burns himself on a pyre. Faramir is rescued and brought to the Houses of Healing.
** The horns of the Rohirrim echo in the sides of Mindolluin at cockcrow.
** Battle of the Pelennor Fields:
*** Death of Théoden.
*** Aragorn arrrives on the battlefield and raises the standard of Arwen.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee escape and begin their journey north along the Morgai.
** The Battle Under Trees in Mirkwood. Thranduil can drive the enemy from Dol Guldur back.
** Second assault on Lothlórien.
